item.title: Independent consultant to help Software company
item.description: Looking for an independent consultant to help a software company through government certification process for Common Criteria and FIPS 140-2. You must have experience writing required documentation, understanding the certification process, guiding and resolving issues, working with laboratories in Canada (preferable) or US, and obtaining appropriate certificate. Common Criteria EAL 2+ is required and FIPS 140-2 level 2 for software.
item.dc:title: Independent consultant to help Software company
